sentences.sCn: 怎样才可以摆脱烦恼噢?。

sentences.sContent: He helped disencumber her of her worries.
sentences.sContent_eng: He helped disencumber her of her worries.

sentences.sContent: I often am trouble of a few things, how can you disencumber?
sentences.sContent_eng: I often am trouble of a few things, how can you disencumber?
sentences.sCn: 我经常为一些事烦恼，怎么样可以摆脱烦恼？

trans.tranCn: 摆脱烦恼, 不受妨碍
